description: Enhance your LLM applications with a scalable knowledge graph memory system. Utilize semantic search and temporal awareness to manage and retrieve information effectively, ensuring your agents have persistent and contextual memory capabilities.

capabilities.name: create_entities
capabilities.description: Create multiple new entities in your Memento MCP knowledge graph memory system

capabilities.name: create_relations
capabilities.description: Create multiple new relations between entities in your Memento MCP knowledge graph memory. Relations should be in active voice

capabilities.name: add_observations
capabilities.description: Add new observations to existing entities in your Memento MCP knowledge graph memory

capabilities.name: delete_entities
capabilities.description: Delete multiple entities and their associated relations from your Memento MCP knowledge graph memory

capabilities.name: delete_observations
capabilities.description: Delete specific observations from entities in your Memento MCP knowledge graph memory

capabilities.name: delete_relations
capabilities.description: Delete multiple relations from your Memento MCP knowledge graph memory

capabilities.name: get_relation
capabilities.description: Get a specific relation with its enhanced properties from your Memento MCP knowledge graph memory

capabilities.name: update_relation
capabilities.description: Update an existing relation with enhanced properties in your Memento MCP knowledge graph memory

capabilities.name: read_graph
capabilities.description: Read the entire Memento MCP knowledge graph memory system

capabilities.name: search_nodes
capabilities.description: Search for nodes in your Memento MCP knowledge graph memory based on a query

capabilities.name: open_nodes
capabilities.description: Open specific nodes in your Memento MCP knowledge graph memory by their names

capabilities.name: semantic_search
capabilities.description: Search for entities semantically using vector embeddings and similarity in your Memento MCP knowledge graph memory

capabilities.name: get_entity_embedding
capabilities.description: Get the vector embedding for a specific entity from your Memento MCP knowledge graph memory

capabilities.name: get_entity_history
capabilities.description: Get the version history of an entity from your Memento MCP knowledge graph memory

capabilities.name: get_relation_history
capabilities.description: Get the version history of a relation from your Memento MCP knowledge graph memory

capabilities.name: get_graph_at_time
capabilities.description: Get your Memento MCP knowledge graph memory as it existed at a specific point in time

capabilities.name: get_decayed_graph
capabilities.description: Get your Memento MCP knowledge graph memory with confidence values decayed based on time
